subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Cam Ward made 42 saves for his second shutout in a month, and the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Detroit Red Wings, 3-0, on Wednesday to stay in the thick of the Eastern Conference playoff race.
